rules_text:
Choose one –
• Create a Royal Role token and attach it to target creature you control. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}.)[/i]
• You gain 5 life.
• Support 3. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target creatures.)[/i]
